actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-129, by Mr. Moakley.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2788. The resolution waives certain points of order against consideration of the measure for failure to comply with the provisions of clause 2 of rule XXI. Measure will be read by title. Bill is open to amendments.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 30.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 2788) making appropriations for the Department of the Interior and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1990, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 2788 (Department of the Interior and related agencies appropriations).

titles.title: Waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 2788) making appropriations for the Department of the Interior and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1990, and for other purposes.
